In this app you can find good community decks and save them into your account.
More information you shall find in FAQ.
In this app you can find good community decks and save them into your account. 
 
 — This app works only with internet; 
 — For each card you can view its image and its personal quote; 
 — You can copy deck code in order to export it into Hearthstone; 
 — To save the deck, press the Star icon. 
 — To remove the deck from favorite list, visit it from Favorite decks screen and press Star icon. 

 Any of your data is NOT saved and used by me — it is stored at Firebase servers. Your authorization is needed to save decks to Firebase Realtime Database. 

 All decks are taken from www.hearthpwn.com 

 If you have any questions or comments, feel free to email me at iamajavagod@gmail.com.
